item.title: Master Your Sleep & Be More Alert When Awake | Huberman Lab Podcast #2 Summary
item.description: Master Your Sleep & Be More Alert When Awake Key Points Sleep and wakefulness govern mental and physical health. Getting good sleep improves focus and alertness when awake. Two forces govern sleep: (1) adenosine, a chemical that increases with time awake making you sleepy, and (2) circadian rhythms set by sunlight that regulate sleep/wake cycles.
